workflow.name: Generate & publish social media content with Gemini, Kie.ai, and Late API
workflow.description:
## ðŸ“˜ Overview
This workflow automates **end-to-end social media publishing** powered by **Late API**.  
It generates text content with **Google Gemini**, creates branded visuals with **Kie.ai**, uploads media to **Late**, and publishes across multiple platforms (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, TikTok).  

Itâ€™s a production-ready automation for marketing teams who want to save hours of work by letting AI handle both copywriting and design â€” all inside n8n.

## âš™ï¸ How it works
1. **Generate text content** â†’ Google Gemini produces platform-optimized copy (tone & length adapted to each network).  
2. **Generate visuals** â†’ Kie.ai Seedream v4 creates branded 1080x1080 images.  
3. **Upload to Late** â†’ media is stored using Lateâ€™s upload API (small & large file handling).  
4. **Publish** â†’ posts are created via Late API on enabled platforms with correct `{ platform, accountId }` mapping.  
5. **Notify** â†’ success logs are sent via Slack, Discord, Email, and Webhook.  

## ðŸ›  Setup Steps
- **Time to setup:** ~10â€“15 minutes  
- **Steps:**
  1. Add your **API keys** in n8n Credentials:
     - Google Gemini API (PaLM)
     - Kie.ai (Seedream)
     - Late API
  2. Insert your **Account IDs** (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, TikTok) into the **Default Settings** node.
  3. Choose which platforms to enable (`ENABLE_FACEBOOK`, `ENABLE_INSTAGRAM`, etc.).
  4. Set your **Business Type** and **Content Topic** (e.g., â€œa tech companyâ€ / â€œnew product launchâ€).
  5. Execute the workflow.  

## ðŸ“ Notes
- **Sticky Notes** are included in the workflow to guide each section: Overview, Prerequisites, Default Settings, Content Generation, Image Generation, Media Upload, Publishing Logic, Notifications, Error Handling.  
- All API keys are handled via **Credentials** (no hardcoding).  
- Fallback content is included in case Gemini fails to parse.  
- Large image files (>4MB) are handled with Lateâ€™s multipart upload flow.  

## ðŸ’¸ Cost per Flow (Estimated)
- **Late API**: $0.00 within Free/Unlimited plans, or â‰ˆ $0.11/post on Build plan ($13/120 posts).  
- **Google Gemini**: ~$0.0001â€“$0.0004 per post (â‰ˆ200 tokens in/out).  
- **Kie.ai (Seedream)**: â‰ˆ $0.01â€“$0.02 per generated image.  

âž¡ï¸ **Total: ~$0.01 â€“ $0.12 per post**, depending mainly on your Late plan & Kie.ai credits.

## ðŸŽ¯ Use cases
- Marketing teams automating cross-platform campaigns.  
- Solo founders posting content daily without design/copy effort.  
- Agencies scaling social media management with AI + automation.  

## ðŸ“¢ Credits
- Built by **Adrian (RoboMarketing)** for the **n8n Arena Challenge â€“ September 2025**.  
- Powered by:
  - [Gemini API](https://ai.google.dev/gemini-api/docs/get-started)  
  - [Kie.ai Seedream](https://kie.ai/seedream-api)  
  - [Late API](https://getlate.dev/docs)

parameters.content: # AI-Generated Social Media Posting with Late API

## ðŸ“Š Workflow Overview

This workflow automates social media publishing:

1. Generate platform-optimized text with **Google Gemini**.  
2. Generate branded images with **Kie.ai**.  
3. Upload media to **Late API**.  
4. Publish posts on selected platforms (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, TikTok).  
5. Send structured success notifications (Slack, Discord, Email, Webhook).

## ðŸ”‘ Prerequisites & Credentials

Required credentials:
- **Google Gemini API key** (PaLM)
- **Kie.ai API key** (DreamSeed model)
- **Late API key**

Required account IDs (from Late dashboard):
- FACEBOOK_ACCOUNT_ID
- INSTAGRAM_ACCOUNT_ID
- LINKEDIN_ACCOUNT_ID
- TIKTOK_ACCOUNT_ID

âš ï¸ Each post requires both { platform, accountId }.

## âš™ï¸ Default Settings

This node defines workflow variables:

- BUSINESS_TYPE â†’ type of company
- CONTENT_TOPIC â†’ topic for content generation
- ENABLE_* â†’ toggle platforms (true/false)
- *_ACCOUNT_ID â†’ required Late account IDs

ðŸ’¡ Change values here to control which platforms are active.

## ðŸ§  Content Generation

**Gemini â€“ Generate Content**
- Calls Google Gemini (gemini-2.5-flash).
- Produces JSON with platform-specific texts:
  { topic, facebook, instagram, tiktok, linkedin, hashtags, bestTime }

**Parse & Filter Platforms**
- Extracts texts per platform.
- Filters only enabled platforms.
- Adds platformCount for reporting.

## ðŸŽ¨ Image Generation

**Model & provider**
- Kie.ai â†’ ByteDance **Seedream v4** (T2I + I2I + Editing)
- Flow:
  - Create Task â†’ Poll recordInfo â†’ use `resultUrls[0]` as CDN URL (passed to Late API)

### ðŸ’¸ Pricing (as of 2025-09-26)
Assumptions: 1MP ~ 1024Ã—1024 image. Higher resolutions scale proportionally.

- **Seedream via Kie.ai (v3 reference)**: ~**$0.0175 / image** (3.5 credits) â€” typical rate cited for Seedream v3 on Kie.ai.  
  *Indicative for v4; check your Kie.ai plan.*  
- **Seedream via BytePlus (official API)**: **$0.03 / image** (+ **200 free images**).  
- **Nano Banana (Gemini 2.5 wrapper)**: **â‰ˆ $0.12 / edit** on Premium monthly (â‰ˆ619 edits for $59.9); basic one-time pack â‰ˆ **$0.25 / edit**.  
- **FAL.ai (aggregator, FLUX family)** *(normalized to 1MP)*:
  - FLUX.1 **dev**: **$0.025 / MP** (â‰ˆ$0.025 / 1MP image)
  - FLUX.1 **pro**: **$0.05 / MP**
  - FLUX.1 **schnell**: **$0.003 / MP** (fast/cheap, lower fidelity)

### âœ… Why Seedream (Kie.ai) here
1) **Quality & prompt adherence** suitable for brand assets; strong editing & consistency.  
2) **Simple integration** (task â†’ poll â†’ CDN URL) fits n8n + Late upload flow.  
3) **Cost-effective at scale** versus Nano Banana subscriptions; comparable or better than many FAL image models for 1MP, with higher consistency for marketing creatives.

> **Rule of thumb (1K images @ ~1MP):**  
> Kie.ai Seedream v3 ref ~$17.5 â†’ BytePlus $30 â†’ FAL FLUX dev ~$25 â†’ Nano Banana ~$120 (Premium) / ~$250 (one-time).

## ðŸ“¦ Media Upload to Late

Uploads images to Late API depending on size:

- â‰¤ 4MB â†’ direct upload
- > 4MB â†’ multipart flow:
   1. Init Upload (Late API)
   2. Download Large File
   3. Upload to Storage (PUT)

âœ… Ensures files are properly stored before posting.

## ðŸš€ Publishing Logic

Branches per platform:
- IF Facebook â†’ Late Create Post Facebook
- IF Instagram â†’ Late Create Post Instagram
- IF LinkedIn â†’ Late Create Post LinkedIn
- IF TikTok â†’ Late Create Post TikTok

Each post sends:
POST https://getlate.dev/api/v1/posts
{
  content: "text + hashtags",
  publishNow: true,
  platforms: [{ platform, accountId }],
  mediaItems: [{ type: "image", url }]
}

## ðŸ“¢ Notifications & Logging

**Merge** responses from all platforms.

**Success Notification & Logging**
- Builds structured messages for:
  - Slack
  - Discord
  - Email
  - Webhook

Includes:
- Post ID
- Platform
- Content preview
- Timestamp

## âš ï¸ Error Handling

Common issues:
- Missing accountId â†’ check Default Settings.
- Large files failing â†’ check upload URL from Late.
- Empty content â†’ Gemini fallback text used.
- Invalid credentials â†’ update API keys.

ðŸ›  Errors stop only the failing branch; other platforms continue.

## ðŸ”‘ [Gemini API (Google AI Studio)](https://ai.google.dev/gemini-api/docs/get-started) Gemini API Key

Steps
1) Open Google AI Studio â†’ API Keys.
2) Click **Create API key** (choose or create a Cloud project if prompted).
3) Copy the key and store it securely.
4) (Optional) Restrict the key (HTTP referrers / IPs) in Google Cloud Console.

Use in requests
- Header:  x-goog-api-key: YOUR_KEY
- Or as query param: ?key=YOUR_KEY

Quick test (curl)
curl -s -X POST \
  "https://generativelanguage.googleapis.com/v1beta/models/gemini-2.5-flash:generateContent?key=YOUR_KEY" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "contents":[{"parts":[{"text":"Say hello"}]}],
    "generationConfig":{"maxOutputTokens":64}
  }'

n8n
- Create Credential: HTTP Bearer YOUR_TOKEN_HERE API Key (per node), or store as env var.
- Use in **Gemini â€“ Generate Content** HTTP node.

## ðŸ§© [Kie.ai (Seedream)](https://kie.ai/seedream-api)

Steps
1) Sign up / log in at Kie.ai â†’ API Key Management.
2) Create an API key (Bearer YOUR_TOKEN_HERE) and copy it.
3) (Optional) Check credits endpoint to verify: GET /api/v1/chat/credit

Use in requests
- Header:  Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN_HERE

Seedream v4 flow (used here)
- POST /api/v1/jobs/createTask
  { "model": "bytedance/seedream-v4-text-to-image", "input": { "prompt": "...", "image_size": "square_hd", "image_resolution": "1K" } }
- Poll: GET /api/v1/jobs/recordInfo?taskId=...
- Use data.resultJson.resultUrls[0] as CDN image URL.

n8n
- Create Credential: HTTP Bearer â€œKie.aiâ€.
- Attach to **Kie.ai â€“ Generate Image** and **Obtain Image** nodes.

## ðŸš€ [Late API](https://getlate.dev/docs)

Steps
1) Create an account at getlate.dev and connect social accounts.
2) Generate an **API key** in the Late dashboard (Account/Settings â†’ API).
3) Copy the key and keep it secure.

Use in requests
- Header:  Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN_HERE

Core endpoints (used here)
- POST /api/v1/media      â†’ upload images (small: multipart, large: init + PUT)
- POST /api/v1/posts      â†’ publish or schedule posts
  {
    "content": "...",
    "publishNow": true,
    "platforms": [{ "platform": "facebook", "accountId": "..." }],
    "mediaItems": [{ "type": "image", "url": "CDN_URL" }]
  }

n8n
- Create Credential: HTTP Bearer â€œLateâ€.
- Attach to upload + posting nodes (Media & Create Post).

### ðŸ’¸ Run Cost Cheat-Sheet â€” â€œAI-Generated Social Postâ€ Flow

**What gets billed per run**

* **Text generation (Gemini 2.5 Flash)**

  * *Free Tier (AI Studio / API free tier):* **$0** (rate-limited). ([Google AI for Developers][1])
  * *Paid Tier (interactive API):* **$0.30 / 1M input tokens** and **$2.50 / 1M output tokens**.
    *Batch API is ~50% of interactive prices.* ([Google AI for Developers][1])

* **Image generation (Seedream v4 via Kie.ai)**

  * Typical credit pricing: ~**$0.04â€“$0.069 per image** depending on plan/volume. ([Seedream-4][2])

* **Publishing (Late API)**

  * **Subscription-based**; marginal cost per post is **$0** within plan limits
    (Free: 10 posts/mo; Build: 120 posts/mo; Accelerate/Dominate/Enterprise: unlimited posts). ([Late][3])

---

**Quick estimate (paid Gemini tier)**

```
Estimated LLM cost = 
  (input_tokens / 1,000,000) * $0.30 +
  (output_tokens / 1,000,000) * $2.50
Total per run â‰ˆ LLM cost + image_cost (â‰ˆ $0.04â€“$0.069) + $0 (Late)
```

**Example:** ~600 input tokens + ~800 output tokens
LLM â‰ˆ (600 * 0.30 + 800 * 2.50) / 1,000,000 â‰ˆ **$0.0022**
Image â‰ˆ **$0.05** â†’ **~$0.052 per full run** (posting cost covered by Late plan).

> **Tips**
>
> * Staying on **AI Studio free tier** makes LLM cost $0; only image (and your Late plan) remains. ([Google AI for Developers][1])
> * If you batch-generate captions, **Batch API is ~50% cheaper** than interactive. ([Google AI for Developers][1])

user.name: Adrian
user.bio:
Founder @RoboMarketing 

I help businesses automate communication with chatbots and AI. Focused on WhatsApp, Messenger, Instagram, and website automation. 

Writing about practical automation strategies, AI tools, and conversational design. 

Passionate about building smart systems that save time and increase efficiency.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
